review: I like it but one of the things that i have been having an issue with was watching my Prime on the TV series if it auto starts the next one the audio is distorted and i have to go out to the home page and restart the episode and everything is fine.

review: More than I expected it to be. My daughter loves that she can play games on this and use my phone as a voice remote. She simply says the name of the show she wants  on the firestick  tv app on my phone and it pulls it right up.

review: Love it.. easy to install and use!
